description: doc: link to sub-repositories from reference page

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5752049/diff/3001/doc/reference.html
File doc/reference.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5752049/diff/3001/doc/reference.html#newcode62
doc/reference.html:62: Packages that are part of the Go Project but are not part of the core tree.
say what they are? it's not obvious how image and crypto compare to, well, image and crypto.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=08f1dbc40bb0 ***
